nodes.text: Moff Jarnek's palace was located on the planet Spirador in the Tandon sector. This was Moff Harlov Jarnek's primary residence. The Covallon spy, Dælar vuv Tertarrnek, who masqueraded as Jarnek's pet, also spent much time here. It was from this location that he sent coded transmissions to an Alliance to Restore the Republic probot in the Spirador system.
